trans-unit.source: Provides <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement" /> objects for each state of the leftmost item of the header control.
This class cannot be inherited.

Each property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Header.ItemLeft> class gets a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> for a different state of the leftmost header item.
trans-unit.target: 每个属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Header.ItemLeft>类获取<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement>最左端标头项的不同状态。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Header.ItemLeft.Normal%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>与<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement>返回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Header.ItemLeft.Normal%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此示例，请将其粘贴到 Windows 窗体中。

trans-unit.source: Handle the form’s <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the `DrawVisualStyleElementHeaderItemLeft1` method from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 处理窗体的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件并调用`DrawVisualStyleElementHeaderItemLeft1`方法从<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件处理方法，并传递`e`作为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a visual style element that represents the leftmost header item in the hot state.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement" /> that represents the leftmost header item in the hot state.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement" /> ，表示在热状态的最左端标头项。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Header.ItemLeft.Hot%2A> property to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>.

The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Header.ItemLeft.Hot%2A> property.
